name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Data Architect with over 9 years of experience, I specialize in **Data Architecture**, **Data Engineering**, and the development of robust **Data Pipelines**, **ETL** and **ELT** processes. I have expertise in using **Cloud Platforms** such as **Azure**, **AWS**, and **GCP**, alongside tools like **Snowflake**, **Databricks**, and **BigQuery** to create scalable solutions and **Data Lakes** and **Data Warehouses** that enhance data accessibility and governance. I am skilled in implementing **AI/ML Techniques** to drive innovation and improve business intelligence. My strengths in leadership and team management allow me to effectively oversee cross-functional teams, mentor junior engineers, and ensure projects align with user experience and performance goals while adhering to privacy regulations and enterprise architecture standards. I am committed to collaboration, agile methodologies, and proactive stakeholder management, enhancing technical excellence in every initiative.

experience.responsibilities:
• Lead the design and implementation of **Data Architecture** for cloud-based services on **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring robust **ETL** and **ELT** processes for seamless data migration across **Data Lakes** and **Data Warehouses**.
• Leverage **Machine Learning** techniques to enhance data-driven decision making, implementing AI/ML features in accordance with privacy regulations and data governance policies.
• Collaborate cross-functionally with stakeholders to develop and maintain **Data Pipelines** and ensure data quality across platforms like **Snowflake**, **Databricks**, and **BigQuery**.
• Spearhead the adoption of **Agile Methodologies** to efficiently manage project deliverables and enhance team performance, successfully reducing the development cycle by **30%**.
• Conduct performance management and coaching sessions for team members, improving overall team output by **25%**.
• Direct the creation and deployment of data solutions using **Cloud Platforms**, focusing on scalability and compliance with enterprise architecture standards.
• Oversee complex integrations involving relational databases such as **Oracle**, **MySQL**, **MS SQL**, and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
• Enhance collaboration practices by facilitating regular stand-ups and retrospectives, reinforcing effective communication among team members and stakeholders.

• Designed and developed **Data Pipelines** to efficiently manage and process large datasets across **Cloud Platforms** including **Azure**, **AWS**, and **GCP**.
• Implemented **ETL/ELT processes** for **Data Lakes** and **Data Warehouses** ensuring seamless data integration and accessibility.
• Led the architectural design for large-scale data solutions employing **Snowflake** and **Databricks**, achieving data retrieval speeds of up to **100x** compared to traditional methods.
• Managed **Data Governance** initiatives to ensure compliance with **Privacy Regulations**, enhancing data security and quality across systems.
• Headed cross-functional team collaboration by enforcing **Agile Methodologies**, resulting in a **30%** increase in project delivery timelines.
• Mentored junior team members in **Machine Learning** techniques and principles, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and innovation.
• Facilitated stakeholder management meetings to communicate architectural plans and project updates, achieving a **95%** satisfaction rating from business units.
• Spearheaded the implementation of Business Intelligence tools that provided actionable insights, enhancing decision-making processes for **multiple stakeholders**.

• Designed and implemented Data Pipelines leveraging **AWS, Azure**, and **GCP** to enhance data architecture efficiency by **30%**.
• Developed and managed ETL processes to support Data Warehouses and Data Lakes, ensuring data integrity and governance in compliance with privacy regulations.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to optimize data workflows and integrate machine learning models using **Databricks** and **Snowflake**.
• Provided technical leadership in adopting Agile methodologies, resulting in a **20%** improvement in project delivery timelines.
• Conducted performance management and coaching for team members to bolster skills in data engineering and architecture.
• Communicated data strategies effectively to stakeholders, contributing to a **15%** increase in stakeholder engagement in data-driven decisions.
• Refined enterprise architecture principles to support generative AI and business intelligence initiatives, improving analytical capabilities across the organization.
